content: मोट्टायितं Silent involuntary expression of affection towards an absent lover, as when a woman, her mind being taken up by her lover, scratches the ear &c. when he is remembered or talked of; it is thus defined by उज्ज्वलमणिः - कांतस्मरणवार्तादौ हृदि तद्भ वभावतः . प्राकट्यमभिलाषस्य मोट्टायितमुदीर्यते; see <ls>S. D. 141</ls> also; सद्यो मोट्टायितमधुरिमोल्लासभंगीविधाता <ls>Ud. S. 35.</ls>
